CmdLine: apt-get update && apt-get install -y   build-essential   git   wget   cmake   autoconf   libncurses5-dev   bison   libmysqlclient-dev   mysql-client
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: mkdir build &&     cd build &&     git clone https://github.com/infusion/udf_infusion.git &&     cd udf_infusion &&     ./configure &&     make &&     make install
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: apt-get install -y libmysqlclient-dev libpcre3-dev &&     apt-get install -y libtool automake autoconf autogen &&     git clone https://github.com/mysqludf/lib_mysqludf_preg.git &&     cd lib_mysqludf_preg &&     aclocal &&     automake --add-missing &&     autoreconf --force --install &&     ./configure &&     make &&     make install &&     echo "general_log_file = /var/log/query.log" >> /etc/mysql/conf.d/docker.cnf &&     echo "general_log      = 1" >> /etc/mysql/conf.d/docker.cnf &&     service mysql start &&     mysql -uroot -pcicero <./installdb.sql
Commands.Name: run
